Constructor Detail

MatrixLogWriter

public MatrixLogWriter(Context context)
Turn tracing on for all sessions with type=LOGWRITER, filename=eMatrix.log
Parameters:
Context - context: the current active context
Since:
ADK 9.5

MatrixLogWriter

public MatrixLogWriter(Context context,
                       java.lang.String filename,
                       java.lang.String type,
                       boolean allFlag)
Turn tracing of specified type on/off for this/all sessions
Parameters:
Context - context: the current active context
String - filename: name of file for tracing output
String - type: type of tracing desired (all caps: MQL, SQL, MINE)
boolean - onFlag: true to turn trace on, false to turn it off
boolean - allFlag: true to trace all sessions; false for this session only
Throws:
MatrixException - when context cannot be established
Since:
ADK 9.5
